item.description:
Happy New Year Incubators!!

Time to hold true to those resolutions and stay in shape. Improvised shape that is. So come work out your mind, your smiles, and your funnny bones.

As usual, we'll run through a smattering of improv games and exercises. Let's start the year off with a theme!
Answer that question below and we'll pick one as the theme at the incubator tomorrow!

Remember no improv or acting experience required. Come one, come all, invite your friends, family, and closet monsters.

Any question? Let me know!

Cheers, peace, and prosperity!

Jason J.

p.s. I did not with the lottery, so this will not be the bling edition of the incubator
item.name: Chasing Incubator
